Package: com.android.build.gradle.api

[Java] Interface VariantFilter

  • Interface for variant control, allowing to query a variant for some base data and allowing to disable some variants.

    • Methods Summary

        Methods 
        Type Name and description
        com.android.builder.model.BuildType getBuildType()
        Returns the Build Type.
        com.android.builder.model.ProductFlavor getDefaultConfig()
        Returns the ProductFlavor that represents the default config.
        List<GroupableProductFlavor> getFlavors()
        Returns the list of flavors, or an empty list.
        void setIgnore(boolean ignore)
        Sets whether or not to ignore this particular variant.

    • Method Detail

      • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public com.android.builder.model.BuildType getBuildType()

        Returns the Build Type.

      • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public com.android.builder.model.ProductFlavor getDefaultConfig()

        Returns the ProductFlavor that represents the default config.

      • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public List<GroupableProductFlavor> getFlavors()

        Returns the list of flavors, or an empty list.

      • public void setIgnore(boolean ignore)

        Sets whether or not to ignore this particular variant. Default is false.

        Parameters:
        ignore - whether to ignore the variant
